bio:
This jailer is in charge of the prison at Fort Pale Pass in Cyrodiil, just south of the Pale Bass border with Skyrim. He is an Imperial man with very short hair and a thin beard. He is having trouble getting a certain Stormcloak prisoner to cough up his secrets, and Legate Precilius Varro has the requested the player to assist him in this endeavor.
During the day, he can usually be found patrolling the prison. After his shift, he has dinner at the mess hall.
He is equipped with Imperial light armor, bracers and boots. He is armed with an Imperial sword, bow and shield, and a large supply of steel arrows.
name: Jailer
